pages.text: Eidolon Reprised brings the dark arts to Minecraft, introducing necromancy and alchemy. $(br2)Harness the power of souls and perform rituals to obtain powerful artifacts, summon creatures, and delve into the mysteries of magic.

To begin your journey, collect Lead and Pewter, key materials in Eidolon. $(br2)Craft a Crucible and use it to create alchemical mixtures. $(br2)Build a Worktable to start crafting magical items like the Censer and Soul Shard, which are vital for summoning rituals.

Expand your knowledge by building an Arcane Workbench and performing advanced rituals. $(br2)Summon powerful allies like Wraiths or raise Skeletons to serve you. $(br2)Master necromancy, unlock the secrets of alchemy, and become a true practitioner of the dark arts!
